lender.name: Chand and Amrita
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is a better solution for poverty than charity is.
lender.occupational_info: I work at Zynga, where I help to create some of the most popular social games on the iPhone. I coordinate the engineering, design, and marketing efforts necessary to create and maintain our iPhone games.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for all I have been given , and to all of those who helped me in my journey. Every act of sharing increases the light in the world... Every act of love, every wilingness to help another helps each of us and the planet... what an easy act, to say yes to so small a request, and give another the means to help him/herself with dignity. And each small kindness, that sharing karma , goes round without end.
lender.occupational_info: Diagnosing illness from images, including xrays, ultrasounds, CT scans, MRI.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I care for people with chronic illnesses.

lender.name: Pami
lender.loan_because: I endeavour to return the kindness bestowed upon me in this lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I help people that are affected by natural disasters.

lender.name: Amir
lender.loan_because: I want to see your business grow!
lender.occupational_info: I invest in companies of all sizes to help them grow.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: it's a way to help others improve their lives and achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Noma
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in other parts of the world that do not have as much as I do. My children knew this and I got a gift certificate for Christmas.
lender.occupational_info: I retired from working in hospitals. I worked in the departments that took care of the supplies and equipment used by the medical staff for the patients.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs for a big company

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: the microlending method empowers the entrepreneur to grow and develop their business enabling them to succeed on their own rather than charitable means.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.occupational_info: Oversee construction of commericial office space across the country

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva has a great approach of smarting small to make big changes.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of the world community. This in my chance to help others so they can work for a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Academic emergency physician and pediatrician, teacher and researcher.

lender.name: Newts Greens Meds Uwitz
lender.loan_because:
This year instead of giving Chritstmas presents to each other we put the money into Micro Loan investments. We want to help people help themselves........small steps in the fight against global poverty.
The Newton, Green, Urowitz and Mederios families.

lender.name: Ottavio
lender.loan_because: together we can make this world a better place.

lender.name: Norma
lender.loan_because: I received a gift of Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: Produce

lender.name: Krow
lender.loan_because: It is a really good use of money to work together in improving our planet. As each of us here becomes more self sufficient and happier the world is in a better place. It is the collective that makes the whole and we are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I work counseling people and helping people through rough situations and transitions in life.

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: it is the root of our economic system and mobility that lets each one of us define the success of our own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I determine whether programs to help people with alcohol and drug abuse problems are successful.

lender.name: Bala
lender.loan_because: I consider this a social cause which will serve the world's good.
lender.occupational_info: Information Technology

lender.name: James & Tricia
lender.loan_because: We may not be rich, but we are both very blessed and want to do what we can.
lender.occupational_info: James works in recreation for a University and Tricia is a lawyer.

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: I want to "pay it forward" for all the help that people have provided me in my past.

lender.name: Burton
lender.loan_because: I am a fan of grass-roots capitalism
lender.occupational_info: I get up early to make sure the horses are well fed and getting along well in their pastures.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I wish everyone would have the opportunities they deserve in life.

lender.name: Darryl Rose
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to convince myself that I'm almost self-actualized.
lender.occupational_info: I analyse data and present information so corporations can make better decisions.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I loan because I love the entrepreneurial spirit.

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: KIVA is a wonderful way to help. My son helped me decide who to fund the first time, it was a great way to spend our holiday time.
lender.occupational_info: Work as a grant program assistant

lender.name: Emerald
lender.loan_because: I love to help people and watch them succeed! Also seeing people succeed and knowing i took part in it makes me feel great!

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I believe in making connections across the globe. I like to travel and hope some day to visit someone I have made a loan to.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate media relations and public information for a small hospital in the Pacific Northwest. I am also a semi-professional stage and radio actor.

lender.name: WIE
lender.loan_because: We decided as a women's soccer team that we would pool our money and donate it while following the updates as a team!
lender.occupational_info: We are North Suburban Chicago teachers that all play on a women's soccer team together in Libertyville, IL.

lender.name: Rochelle & Bob
lender.loan_because: encouraging the development of a community's economy is much more sustainable than a charitable donation. Simply giving money will not raise the global status of women or improve literacy or end poverty.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: My grandchildren and I work together to choose businesses to invest in. It helps us all to better understand and respond to the worldwide needs of others.

lender.name: Deepa
lender.loan_because: Because I like the way the entrepreneurs utoilise the resources
lender.occupational_info: CIvil Society Awareness

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I want to see people released from poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help hire good police officers, then I help those police officers get the training they need to do a good job protecting the public. I also go to crime scenes and help catch and convict people who have commited horrible crimes.

lender.name: Lon
lender.loan_because: It's the least we can do.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: We are all people.
lender.occupational_info: I build roads and commercial buildings.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people across the world, one person at a time. I am very impressed by the people who use their creativity and the resources available to them. I want to encourage that spirit.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference, and kiva.org makes it so easy to start giving loans!
lender.occupational_info: I work for Google Maps - a digital map of the world accessible via the internet: http://maps.google.com.

lender.name: Nudyan
lender.loan_because: together we can change the world's economy for the better.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to able to support entrepreneurial people.
lender.occupational_info: I co-own and run advertising agencies.

lender.name: Angie Los Angeles, CA
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in helping worthy people lift themself upward and onward.
lender.occupational_info: I provide medical care to women and men with HIV/AIDS.

lender.name: Elisa
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering one women at a time. It benefits them, their families and society!
lender.occupational_info: I work on international development on women's economic and political empowerment worldwide.

lender.name: Jule
lender.loan_because: It works !
lender.occupational_info: Design Artist for TV and Film

lender.name: Carroll
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I design ads, invitations, brochures, catalogs and booklets.

lender.name: Kaitlin
lender.loan_because: I love.

lender.name: Patterson Family
lender.loan_because: We want to be able to reach out and help others. We are blessed to have everything we need.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I'd rather you borrowed from me than from a bank
lender.occupational_info:
I work in a government office.
I ride my bike down the hill to work each day, but I catch the train home. The trains are old and rickety, but you can take your bike onboard for free.

lender.name: Violeta
lender.loan_because: People need to make their dreams a reality.
lender.occupational_info:
I design clothing made with the highest concern for our environment, the people who make them and wear them, using organic, vintage and reclaimed materials.
Currently working on creative design projects in collaboration with indigenous communities in the Amazon, to promote their arts and crafts, by incorporating their millenary work into contemporary designs, as a means to generate a sustainable economy for the stewards of the most biodiverse ecosystem.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: it allows me to make a difference and help entrepreneurs bring their dreams to reality.
lender.occupational_info: My work in the international trade area is constantly expanding. At work I specialize in providing foreign duty/tax information for over 138 countries. I'm also a licensed U.S. Customs Broker (number pending) where I'll assist importers with U.S. regulations and compliance.

lender.name: Kathie and Brian
lender.loan_because: I feel life is short and can melt away in a moment - so it isn't about what you have, it's about what you do.
lender.occupational_info: We stand around alot , greet and meet people - weather forecasting ,the warmer it is the smaller we get.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: it decreases worldsuck.
lender.occupational_info: I help boys at a private school learn to love reading and provide them with a room full of books.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to loan, making a big difference by contributing little
lender.occupational_info: I work as Disposal Site Representative for Heerema Marine Contractors, commuting between the Netherlands where I live and Norway where I work. Currently I am involved in the cessation of several Ekofisk offshore constructions, the project will last until 2014.

lender.name: D. Gail
lender.loan_because: When I heard about this, I knew I wanted to help those who want to help themselves and their families. And what a great Christmas gift to myself!
lender.occupational_info: Retired after 30 years from the Telecommunication Business. Now I am a "Domestic Engineer" and loving every minute.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the ambitious and driven individuals who want to benefit their local communities in need and strive to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a college student at San Diego State. Ifeel that this is organization one I can positively participate and actively be apart of something good.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.occupational_info: I am studying continuously to achieve my educational goals.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: It is wonderful to see how people make use of their strength. I am honered to contribute.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children in the age of 12-16 about religion, spirituality, to be aware of who they are en how they interact with others etc.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I should. I am a returned peace corps volunteer and it's programs like this that actually work. Its real, its direct and it helps.
lender.occupational_info: I answer the phone for people who have emergencies and send them help.

lender.name: Nellie
lender.loan_because: For me a relatively small amount, for the entrepreneur so very important to start a business.

lender.name: Del
lender.loan_because: the Gods ask me to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a spiritual counselor and healer.

lender.name: austin
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: R. Wijaya
lender.loan_because: I think people deserves a chance to better their lives. It is uplifting to know that somewhere across the world is using my loan for the good of their family.
lender.occupational_info: I help people manage operational risk.

lender.name: Suzy + Eric
lender.loan_because: we can.

lender.name: Cooper-French bulldog
lender.loan_because: I truly believe in entrepreneurship. A little help can change someone's life.

lender.name: Kurt and Inger
lender.loan_because: We would like to contribute so other people get a chance too.

lender.name: Lasse
lender.occupation: Managing director of a television station
lender.loan_because: I belive in helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I help small organisations bring their good messages to a large Tv-audience. (We reach 190.000 viewers)

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I am extremely grateful for what I have and wish to share with others.

lender.name: david henderson
lender.loan_because: Its such a brilliant idea!
lender.occupational_info: Supporting community and voluntary sector organisations to grow and develop

lender.name: Sierra Foundation
lender.loan_because: The foundation believes in supporting business women and men.
lender.occupational_info: The foundation is a grant giving and loan supplying organisation with the capital funded by a Dutch entrepreneur and business man.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world by helping others.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: Money is only useful when it is circulating. My family and I have benefited from the kindness of others. We wish to pass along the kindness by sharing our gifts.
lender.occupational_info: I help in my childrens' schools.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I've been very lucky in life. I'm not at all wealthy but got a lovely house in a beautiful place with fantastic friends and live with the best person ever

lender.name: Deanna
lender.loan_because: We cannot hope to build a better world without improving individuals. We all must work for our own improvement and at the same time share a general responsibility for all humanity.

lender.name: jaggco
lender.loan_because: A brick a day creates a monument, I hope micro lending creates a new economy and helps those in need.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: To enable other entrepreneurs to get started.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I've read how effective micro-loans can be and what a difference they can make to the entrepreneurs. Kiva makes it easy to contribute to this effort and to follow the progress of the developing businesses. I'm glad loans to US entrepreneurs are now included!

lender.name: Nicolette
lender.loan_because: I have every thing I need in this world and I would like to give others a change to

lender.name: John and Pat
lender.occupation: retired and soon to be retired
lender.loan_because: We want to give these folks a chance to realize their potential.

lender.name: Andr
lender.loan_because: A little from someone in the first world can make a huge difference for someone in the third world.
lender.occupational_info: I study fish, how different types of fish are related, where they move around in the ocean, and how human impact and climate change will affect them.

lender.name: Rodney
lender.loan_because: The Power of Many that have, helping the Many that dont have...
lender.occupational_info: I work with Hyperion Essbase Data Bases...

lender.name: Jani
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Els
lender.occupational_info: teacher

lender.name: Kaci
lender.loan_because: I want to help the friends, and the friends of friends, that I've been lucky enough to make across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I do whatever I can to make people happy and safe.

lender.name: United Methodist Men
lender.loan_because: We want to help improve lives around the world. Kiva appeals to our belief in social justice and the entrepreneurial spirit.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to help in breaking the cycle of poverty. I feel that I have been blessed to have financial comfort in my life and I want to give back to those who are less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I work with women to help them to discover and connect to their own unique gifts and talents and to create a life filled with purpose and passion.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: maintain computers at an art college.

lender.name: family of Stacy tosh
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference to everyone involved. We are blessed with all that we need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurturer, to the land and my children. I love to get my hands dirty for both.

lender.name: Bud and Lyndel
lender.loan_because: It's needed and our desire to give to those who will work for their future.

lender.name: Anjali
lender.occupational_info: I am in 7th grade.

lender.name: The Sheridan Seven
lender.loan_because: it is important to pay it forward

lender.name: rafael
lender.loan_because: I don't want large charities mishandling money. I'd like to know who I'm helping. Also, loans are empowering - they reward effort.
lender.occupational_info: I organize various contractors to build construction projects.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because:
I think it's a fun way to give to charity-- it's the giving that keeps on giving!
I wish everyone a successful business.

lender.name: Nicole + Gary
lender.loan_because: Chris and Kate Toivonen (the parents of our niece, as pictured) gave us the gift of investing in someone's future Christmas Eve 2007. We will continue to loan because we feel that helping people create their own work is an amazing thing! We hope to one day visit some of the businesses that have been in our portfolio.
lender.occupational_info:
Nicole works with people to help them write effectively for the internet at the University of Toronto.
Gary just graduated from the University of Toronto, and supervises a parking garage.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: These people seem to know how to smile, work and enjoy life. I like to see some of what I have earned get involved in that feeling.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I volunteered in Peace Corps and like to give back to parts of the world that gave me so much.
lender.occupational_info: I give advice to people on how to invest their money so they can live comfortably after they have stopped working.

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: It is a very personal way of helping others who really need the help. This is something God placed in my heart - this need to help the poor - from my earliest recollections as a child. As a result, it feeds my own soul to answer this need that He placed within me.
lender.occupational_info: I taught school for 33 years - most of them part-time as I raised my family of 3 sons. I now care for the children of a teacher's family, and delight in being part of their family network as I continue my journey in life.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: we all need a little help from our friends!
lender.occupational_info: Currently I work to help shape policies to better our schools, and hope to return to the classroom eventually.

lender.name: Ana-Livia & Eric
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Stephen & Deborah
lender.loan_because: it's fun to imagine our hands reaching across the planet to touch other hands. Individuals acting on their convictions are more certain to change the world than reliance on agencies or governments.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people. I am in the 3rd grade.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school. I am in grade 3.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I want to reach a helping hand to around the world to help women help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a working mom, too, trying to be faithful in a complicated world.

lender.name: Bill
lender.occupational_info: Commercial Real Estate Brokerage

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to support women in countries where they are marginalized.
lender.occupational_info: I deliver babies for women in their homes instead of in a hospital.

lender.name: J.B. and K.B.
lender.loan_because: We want to help fulfill people's dreams and ambitions.

lender.name: David-Michelle
lender.loan_because: we believe everyone can be self-sufficient and happy
lender.occupational_info: we buy distressed businesses and help make them profitable

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: There are so many human beings out there who need help. Veiwing this website for the first time brought tears to my eyes, it let me know that there are still people out there who truly like to help others. I want to be one of those people.
lender.occupational_info: I am an art student at a college in New York. I study Photography as my major and also explore other forms of art. Art is a huge part of my life, it keeps me grounded and allows me to bring the thoughts and feelings in my head into reality.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it's easy and I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I work with other companies addressing their computer systems needs. Currently I'm working on a testing contract in the government sector.

lender.name: Vern, Kim, Coop, Fabiana
lender.loan_because: We loan because God has blessed us so that we can bless others.
lender.occupational_info: We own a sign company that manufacutures signs for businesses large and small. We also manufacture and rent billboard signs.

lender.name: Brent Schondelmeyer
lender.occupational_info: Communications director the Local Investment Commission (www.kclinc.org) - a non-profit working with low-income communities in the Kansas City, Mo. area.

lender.name: Jack C
lender.loan_because: we don't need a justification to help others be self-sufficient, do we?
lender.occupational_info: I teach in the discipline of Psychology at a local Houston college. Part of this is to motivate students to think more globally about social and humanitarian issues through service learning projects.

lender.name: Noah
lender.occupational_info: I am busy with school

lender.name: Theresa and Arianna
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance at a better life.

lender.name: Aviv
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Student of Socail Work

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help other people in the world to make their dreams a reality.

lender.name: James & Heather
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the lives of people around the world who are able and willing to work hard to better the lives of their family and community.
lender.occupational_info: My wife & I are starting a non-profit organization dedicated to equal rights for both parents - "Fathers & Families of Westchester, Inc."

lender.name: Meira
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a doctor.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I think microfinance can change the world, bit by bit. KIVA has created a phenomenal system to make microfinance happen. I love the fact that the money gets used over and over again as loans are repaid.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a doctor in a minor emergency center, and I love the work that I do.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I can. Small amounts of money can have a big impact over much of the globe. It makes the world a smaller place.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct Heathcare Marketing Research (Pharmaceuticals and Medical Devices)

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I admire anyone who works to improve their own life.
lender.occupational_info: I publish books. I help with research, find photos and graphics for the books, sell our books to bookstores etc and look after the day-to-day accounting of our business. I work with my husband and there are just the 2 of us in our business.

lender.name: Marie-Thrse
lender.loan_because: this is a valuable way for the people in need with preservation of their selfesteem. It's not a pedantic or patronizing way of helping and allowing the people to make a change themself. It makes them undependant and more strong. Besides it;s a way to help wich is affordable for a lot of people.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an organisatie wich works with yong children 2-4 years old. I think in the USA its could: pre-school or nursery. Our goal is to stimulate the children in their development so they can have a good start at elementary/primary school. I am the coach/manager of a group of nurseryschool-teachers.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want others to have the good life I have.

lender.name: Salim
lender.loan_because: Having been down the difficult path of trying to raise funds has prompted me to ensure that others don't have to endure the same challenges.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: it's such a blessing to wake up everyday and do what you love. Someone helped me get my small business started, so I'd like to pay it forward...
lender.occupational_info: I create whimsical art for your soul.

lender.name: Julianne and Dustin
lender.loan_because: Because I feel a need to help.
lender.occupational_info: I sell toys for children

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: empathy
lender.occupational_info: I own a pub

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am interested in how people in other countries can improve their business and their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I have started a factory that makes machines which measure air leakage in buildings to save energy.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy to know I'm helping people
lender.occupational_info: helping hardworking poor people

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I recently heard about Kiva and decided I would look into the organization and since I am a hairstylist, I thought what better way to start helping out than to help an entrepeneur who is trying to buy supplies for her beauty salon business! I never dreamed that I could be doing this for someone so far away as Uganda!

lender.name: Sarah, Katie, Abbie
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us with money and I want to share it with people who need more money.
lender.occupational_info: Sarah-Grade 5 Katie -Grade 4 Abbie -Grade 2

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I loan because I do not agree with the global system of macro-loaning. I do believe in grassroots initiatives and think micro-loaning is a great way to be a part of a grassroots initiative and support grassroots initiatives. I believe micro financing is a sustainable and ethical way to help people living in poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Prescott College. I am getting a dual-major in Education and Political Science with an emphasis in Peace Education. I am interested in utilizing Adventure Education as a medium to teach these topics through.

lender.name: Robin
lender.occupational_info: I write articles and help improve other people's writing for publication on the Internet.

lender.name: Sallie
lender.loan_because: I want to make sure that we all have the opportunity to work and gain from that work.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people who are really sick.

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: In Loving Memory of Frances Fife. "this is one of the far reaching ideas that help more than one person or family."

lender.name: Sadie & Family
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can and it's important and how great to have a way to help people that is so uncomplicated!

lender.name: Relevant Reverence
lender.loan_because: We believe we are called to give, and believe in the power of this form of giving.
lender.occupational_info:
relevant reverence is an ambition. leaving behind that which has been engulfed in a guise of holiness. and bringing back true outcry.
We are using 10% of our album earnings to sponsor loan recipients through Kiva.org

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are working hard to achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a computer programmer building websites for a large company, and several non-profit organizations.
